snippet: The International Energy Agency said that demand for oil in 2015 was likely to be 230,000 barrels per day less than previously predicted.

byline.original: By STANLEY REED and DAVID JOLLY

lead_paragraph: The International Energy Agency said that demand for oil in 2015 was likely to be 230,000 barrels per day less than previously predicted.

headline.main: Energy Agency Cuts Oil Demand Forecast, Adding to Pressure on Prices

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations
